body:
<!-- This form is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY!

If you're looking for help check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/kubernetes) and the [troubleshooting guide](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/debug-application-cluster/troubleshooting/).

If the matter is security related, please disclose it privately via https://kubernetes.io/security/.
-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

> Uncomment only one, leave it on its own line:
>
/kind bug
> /kind feature


**What happened**: unit tests failed when run under build/run.sh

**What you expected to happen**: unit tests pass

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:
```
./build/run.sh bash -c 'KUBE_VERBOSE=1 make test WHAT=./cluster/gce/gci'
+++ [0718 11:43:17] Verifying Prerequisites....
+++ [0718 11:43:17] Using Docker for MacOS
+++ [0718 11:43:18] Building Docker image kube-build:build-7a26897950-5-v1.10.3-1
+++ [0718 11:43:24] Keeping container kube-build-7a26897950-5-v1.10.3-1
+++ [0718 11:43:24] Keeping container kube-build-data-7a26897950-5-v1.10.3-1
+++ [0718 11:43:24] Keeping container kube-build-7a26897950-5-v1.10.3-1
+++ [0718 11:43:24] Keeping container kube-build-data-7a26897950-5-v1.10.3-1
+++ [0718 11:43:24] Keeping container kube-build-7a26897950-5-v1.10.3-1
+++ [0718 11:43:24] Keeping container kube-build-data-7a26897950-5-v1.10.3-1
+++ [0718 11:43:25] Keeping image kube-build:build-7a26897950-5-v1.10.3-1
+++ [0718 11:43:25] Syncing sources to container
+++ [0718 11:43:25] Stopping any currently running rsyncd container
+++ [0718 11:43:25] Starting rsyncd container
+++ [0718 11:43:26] Running rsync
+++ [0718 11:43:26] Stopping any currently running rsyncd container
+++ [0718 11:43:27] Output from this container will be rsynced out upon completion. Set KUBE_RUN_COPY_OUTPUT=n to disable.
+++ [0718 11:43:27] Running build command...
stat /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/bazel-bin: no such file or directory
2018/07/18 11:43:50 Code for OpenAPI definitions generated
Running tests for APIVersion: v1,admissionregistration.k8s.io/v1alpha1,admissionregistration.k8s.io/v1beta1,admission.k8s.io/v1beta1,apps/v1beta1,apps/v1beta2,apps/v1,authentication.k8s.io/v1,authentication.k8s.io/v1beta1,authorization.k8s.io/v1,authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1,autoscaling/v1,autoscaling/v2beta1,batch/v1,batch/v1beta1,batch/v2alpha1,certificates.k8s.io/v1beta1,coordination.k8s.io/v1beta1,extensions/v1beta1,events.k8s.io/v1beta1,imagepolicy.k8s.io/v1alpha1,networking.k8s.io/v1,policy/v1beta1,rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1,rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1,rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1alpha1,scheduling.k8s.io/v1alpha1,scheduling.k8s.io/v1beta1,settings.k8s.io/v1alpha1,storage.k8s.io/v1beta1,storage.k8s.io/v1,storage.k8s.io/v1alpha1,
+++ [0718 11:43:51] Running tests without code coverage
--- FAIL: TestEncryptionProviderFlag (0.10s)
        configure_helper_test.go:133: whoami: cannot find name for user ID 501
                Start kubernetes api-server
                chown: changing ownership of '/tmp.k8s/configure-helper-test868022621/kube-apiserver.log': Operation not permitted
        configure_helper_test.go:134: Failed to run configure-helper.sh: exit status 1
--- FAIL: TestEncryptionProviderConfig (0.03s)
        configure_helper_test.go:133: whoami: cannot find name for user ID 501
                Start kubernetes api-server
                chown: changing ownership of '/tmp.k8s/configure-helper-test397415192/kube-apiserver.log': Operation not permitted
        configure_helper_test.go:134: Failed to run configure-helper.sh: exit status 1
--- FAIL: TestKMSEncryptionProviderConfig (0.03s)
        configure_helper_test.go:133: whoami: cannot find name for user ID 501
                Start kubernetes api-server
                chown: changing ownership of '/tmp.k8s/configure-helper-test176939927/kube-apiserver.log': Operation not permitted
        configure_helper_test.go:134: Failed to run configure-helper.sh: exit status 1
--- FAIL: TestKMSPluginAndAPIServerSharedVolume (0.03s)
        configure_helper_test.go:133: whoami: cannot find name for user ID 501
                Start kubernetes api-server
                chown: changing ownership of '/tmp.k8s/configure-helper-test067072522/kube-apiserver.log': Operation not permitted
        configure_helper_test.go:134: Failed to run configure-helper.sh: exit status 1
FAIL
FAIL    k8s.io/kubernetes/cluster/gce/gci       0.190s
```


**Anything else we need to know?**:
I've seen this on both docker for mac and linux, with varying uids (501 and 1000).

This patch makes the package's tests pass:
```diff
diff --git a/cluster/gce/gci/apiserver_manifest_test.go b/cluster/gce/gci/apiserver_manifest_test.go
index 5b2d570573..299598aed2 100644
--- a/cluster/gce/gci/apiserver_manifest_test.go
+++ b/cluster/gce/gci/apiserver_manifest_test.go
@@ -51,7 +51,7 @@ readonly DOCKER_REGISTRY="k8s.gcr.io"
 readonly ENABLE_LEGACY_ABAC=false
 readonly ETC_MANIFESTS=${KUBE_HOME}/etc/kubernetes/manifests
 readonly KUBE_API_SERVER_DOCKER_TAG=v1.11.0-alpha.0.1808_3c7452dc11645d-dirty
-readonly LOG_OWNER_USER=$(whoami)
+readonly LOG_OWNER_USER=$(id -un)
 readonly LOG_OWNER_GROUP=$(id -gn)
 ENCRYPTION_PROVIDER_CONFIG={{.EncryptionProviderConfig}}
 ENCRYPTION_PROVIDER_CONFIG_PATH={{.EncryptionProviderConfigPath}}
```

If this is acceptable, I will open a PR. Please let me know!

@immutableT @awly @mikedanese @krousey

labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Cluster Lifecycle.
labels.name: sig/cluster-lifecycle

title: cluster/gce/gci unit test failure using build/run.sh
